pages.text: List of chunk loaders. $(br2)For servers, it is recommended to disable crafting of all loaders.

pages.title: FTBU
pages.text: FTBU is able to claim chunks as well as chunk load them. $(br)To do this you must open your inventory, look for the map icon at the left side of the screen and click it. $(br2)$(li)Left clicking on the map will claim or unclaim chunks. $(li)Shift + left clicking will chunkload. $(br2)This may be altered on servers.

pages.title: CC Chunkloader
pages.text: Chickenchunks Chunkloader is a configurable loader with a deactivation time. Max claim per loader is 3x3. By default it will turn off after 48 hours inactivity.

pages.title: Exu2 Chunk Loading Ward
pages.text: This chunkloader requires GP to keep active and loads a 3x3 area.

pages.title: Mek Anchor Upgrade
pages.text: Chunkloads the machine this is installed in.

pages.title: OC Chunkloader Upgrade
pages.text: Consumes power to load the chunk which the device is located.
